data.label: HMS ML Kit
data.description: 机器学习服务（ML Kit）提供机器学习套件，为开发者使用机器学习能力开发各类应用，提供优质体验。得益于华为长期技术积累，ML Kit 为开发者提供简单易用、服务多样、技术领先的机器学习能力，助力开发者更快更好地开发各类 AI 应用。

data.label: HMS ML Kit
data.description: Machine Learning Kit (ML Kit) provides a suite of machine learning capabilities for developers to use in developing various applications, offering a high-quality experience. Benefiting from Huawei's long-term technical accumulation, ML Kit provides developers with simple, diverse, and technologically advanced machine learning capabilities, helping developers develop various AI applications faster and better.
